:::{#hero-heading}

Hello, I'm Vincent Dutordoir! I'm a PhD student in Information Engineering at the University of Cambridge, working with professor [Zoubin Ghahramani](https://mlg.eng.cam.ac.uk/zoubin/) and [Carl Henrik Ek](http://carlhenrik.com/). 

I am also part-time affiliated to [Secondmind](https://www.secondmind.ai/), where I fulfil the role of senior machine learning researcher.

I was fortunate to spend the second half of 2022 doing an internship at [DeepMind](https://www.deepmind.com/), where I was part of the Safety Analysis team.

My research interests lie in probabilistic machine learning with applications in generative modelling and sequential decision making.

- Gaussian processes
- Deep Generative modelling
- Stochastic Differential Equations.

Besides my research, I love developing full-stack data-centric projects.


::: {#socials}
You can find some of my work on

I'm very happy to connect on [<i class="bi bi-twitter"></i> Twitter](https://twitter.com/vdutor) or via e-mail
on `dutordoirv@gmail.com`.
:::
